about_the_game: The official soundtrack of Shadows of Doubt. Fifty-eight minutes of electronic stealth-noir music spread over thirty-four tracks, including two bonus tracks not featured in the game. Immerse yourself in a world of dark synths, moody atmospheres, dystopian bass and pulse-pounding beats, composed and performed by monomoon. Professionally mastered and delivered in FLAC and MP3 formats. Grab your headphones and Put Some Life Into It!
detailed_description: The official soundtrack of Shadows of Doubt. Fifty-eight minutes of electronic stealth-noir music spread over thirty-four tracks, including two bonus tracks not featured in the game. Immerse yourself in a world of dark synths, moody atmospheres, dystopian bass and pulse-pounding beats, composed and performed by monomoon. Professionally mastered and delivered in FLAC and MP3 formats. Grab your headphones and Put Some Life Into It!

short_description: The official soundtrack of Shadows of Doubt. 58 minutes of dark and moody electronic music spread over 37 tracks, including 2 bonus tracks not featuring in the game.
